video_prompt: Holographic robot emerges and expands from a smartphone screen, a beam of light pushing it upwards. Glowing circuitry and changing internal components animate its torso. Translucent, rectangular data displays pulsate and shift around the robot. The phone screen emits an energetic, expanding circular pattern.
image_prompt: Holographic humanoid robot with glowing blue/magenta circuitry and red eyes emerging from a smartphone. Multiple translucent holographic displays with circuit-like text surround the robot. A vibrant blue/magenta light beam connects the robot to the phone's glowing screen, displaying a circular energy pattern. Dark, blurry background. Futuristic, high-tech digital rendering with sharp details and focused illumination.
refined_video_prompt: A holographic robot emerges and expands from a smartphone screen, a beam of light pushing it upwards. Its internal components shift and reconfigure, with circuitry dynamically glowing within its torso. Translucent, rectangular data displays pulsate and shift around the robot. The phone screen emits an energetic, expanding circular pattern.
